text: (inka) ila anu: " 'Niscayanga, allah i vastuvulanu nisedhincadu.' Ani saksyamicce mi saksulanu tisukoni randi." Okavela varu ala saksyamiste, nivu varito kalisi saksyamivvaku. Mariyu ma sucanalanu asatyalani tiraskarince vari mariyu paralokamu nandu visvasam leni vari mariyu itarulanu tama prabhuvuku samanuluga nilabette vari manovanchalanu nivu e matram anusarincaku
